mapper.sql: ID, NAME, DESCRIPT, HCCL, HCFF, HCXXFL, HCLX, QYZZXS, GSXM, HCFFSM, JGCL, XXDB, DBXXLY, SFXYSDHC, SFXYRGHD, GZQX, SFBJXM, ZXRQ, ZXSM, PAGE, CODE
mapper.insert: insert into T_HCSX (ID, NAME, DESCRIPT, HCCL, HCFF, HCXXFL, HCLX, QYZZXS, GSXM, HCFFSM, JGCL, XXDB, DBXXLY, SFXYSDHC, SFXYRGHD, GZQX, SFBJXM, ZXRQ, ZXSM, PAGE, CODE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descript,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hccl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hcff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hcxxfl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hclx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{qyzzxs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gsxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hcffsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jgcl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{xxdb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbxxly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfxysdhc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sfxyrghd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gzqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfbjxm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zxsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{page,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update T_HCSX
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPT = #{descript,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HCCL = #{hccl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HCFF = #{hcff,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HCXXFL = #{hcxxfl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HCLX = #{hclx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QYZZXS = #{qyzzxs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GSXM = #{gsxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HCFFSM = #{hcffsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JGCL = #{jgcl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
XXDB = #{xxdb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DBXXLY = #{dbxxly,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFXYSDHC = #{sfxysdhc,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SFXYRGHD = #{sfxyrghd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GZQX = #{gzqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFBJXM = #{sfbjxm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZXRQ = #{zxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZXSM = #{zxsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGE = #{page,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_HCSX set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPT = #{descript,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HCCL = #{hccl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HCFF = #{hcff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HCXXFL = #{hcxxfl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HCLX = #{hclx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QYZZXS = #{qyzzxs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GSXM = #{gsxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HCFFSM = #{hcffsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JGCL = #{jgcl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, XXDB = #{xxdb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DBXXLY = #{dbxxly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFXYSDHC = #{sfxysdhc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SFXYRGHD = #{sfxyrghd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GZQX = #{gzqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFBJXM = #{sfbjxm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZXRQ = #{zxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZXSM = #{zxsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGE = #{page,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select 'false' as QUERYID,
from T_HCSX where ID in ( SELECT HCSX_ID FROM T_HCJH_HCSX WHERE HCJH_ID = ( SELECT HCJH_ID FROM T_HCRW WHERE ID= #{hcrwId})) order by to_number(CODE)

select 'hcsx' as name, a.HCSX_ID as value , b.NAME as literal from ( SELECT HCSX_ID FROM T_HCJH_HCSX WHERE HCJH_ID = ( SELECT HCJH_ID FROM T_HCRW WHERE ID=#{hcrwId})) a left join T_HCSX b on a.HCSX_ID = b.ID
